column5: Tempur-Pedic King canopy bed in first bedroom and Queen pillow top sleigh bed in 2nd bedroom. Kitchenette/Modern Bath/Office Space/Salt Water Pool/Covered water decks and pond. ***Additional charge for singles who don't want to share a bed***Sleeps 4  Walk to Whole Foods, restaurants, and shops. Feed the fish, turtles, and ducks from the cantilevered deck and enjoy the spectacular views. Business or pleasure, you'll never want to leave! Need more space: https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/9401454
column8: Resort Luxury Suite with Dallas Waterfront
